entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 6:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: SW 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
